item.title: IPC-MPS 0.09
item.description: 0.09 2010-10-19 - Laziness in message processing supported - IPC::MPS::EV: using EV "default event loop" - Event and EV based side modules support (directly or thru AnyEvent)
item.dc:creator: KNI
item.content:encoded:
0.09  2010-10-19
	- Laziness in message processing supported
	- IPC::MPS::EV: using EV "default event loop"
	- Event and EV based side modules support (directly or thru AnyEvent)

        - arguments must be flagged UTF8 string

item.title: Text-Xslate 0.3000
item.description:
0.3000 2010-11-23 15:19:04 [CHANGES] * `option => undef` passes the option as is, which allows Text::Xslate->new( line_start => undef ) (issue/21, reported by @tomita). Note that this is an IMCOMPATIBLE CHANGE.
[DOCUMENTS] * Update Cookbook and FAQ
item.dc:creator: GFUJI
item.content:encoded:
0.3000 2010-11-23 15:19:04
    [CHANGES]
    * `option => undef` passes the option as is, which allows
      Text::Xslate->new( line_start => undef ) (issue/21, reported by @tomita).
      Note that this is an IMCOMPATIBLE CHANGE.

    [DOCUMENTS]
    * Update Cookbook and FAQ
search.cpan.org
Download

item.title: Continuity 1.3
item.description:
Revision history for Continuity. See the main repository for a detailed list of internal changes.
Version 1.3 (released 2010.11.22) * Stupid version number issue
Version 1.2.0 (released 2010.11.22) * Refactor PSGI adaptor (scrottie) * Random documentation updates
Version 1.1.1 (released 2010.02.05) * Add PSGI Adapter! Try "plackup -s Coro guess.pl" * Remove experimental Plack adapter * PSGI adapter uses AnyEvent, the rest of Continuity will too soon * Misc cleanups
item.dc:creator: AWWAIID
item.content:encoded:
Revision history for Continuity. See the main repository for a detailed list of
internal changes.

Version 1.3 (released 2010.11.22)
  * Stupid version number issue

Version 1.2.0 (released 2010.11.22)
  * Refactor PSGI adaptor (scrottie)
  * Random documentation updates

Version 1.1.1 (released 2010.02.05)
  * Add PSGI Adapter! Try "plackup -s Coro guess.pl"
  * Remove experimental Plack adapter
  * PSGI adapter uses AnyEvent, the rest of Continuity will too soon
  * Misc cleanups
search.cpan.org
Download
